text.0: thou mighty agni gatherest up all that is precious for thy friend.
text.1: bring us all treasures as thou art enkindled in libations place.
text.2: assemble speak together let your minds be all of one accord.
text.3: as ancient gods unanimous sit down to their appointed share.
text.4: the place is common common the assembly common the mind so be their thought united.
text.5: a common purpose do i lay before you and worship with your general oblation.
text.6: one and the same be your resolve and be your minds of one accord.
text.7: united be the thoughts of all that all may happily agree.
